# Chronic Encephalopathy Syndrome (CES)
- Symptoms, including memory [issues](issues.qmd), depression, and impulsive behavior, that manifest themselves after repeated brain traumas. Over time, CES can result in a diagnosis of [chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE)](CTE)).qmd).
